about_the_game:
The average Canadian logger Miles completed his day. On the way home, he is attacked by a bear and Miles loses consciousness.
And Miles is trapped inside his own mind. If you want to wake up the same as before you must to restore your consciousness piece by piece.

Hardcore gameplay is waiting for you to test not only your reaction but also your ingenuity.

Stand up to your fears.

Demo version include first level and full support for controlls.

short_description: Gates of The Mind - is 2D Hardcore Platformer. Game should search you in reaction and ingenuity in boss fights and locations.Each Boss fight and Location have a phases where you must be accurate in your actions and contains non-linear solutions for opening gates of mind.
